body.name: Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting - Wheelchair Cushion for Pressure Sores - Office Chair Car Seat Cushion for Coccyx,Sciatica,Back,Hip & Tailbone Pain - Egg Seat Cushion with Non-Slip Cover, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 46 mins
features: 💝HONEYCOMB BREATHABLE DESIGN - Our gel cushions adopts thousands of balanced pressure and flexible honeycomb grid design, disperses the pressure of the whole buttocks and thighs, perfectly fits the buttocks curve, allowing you to power through your day, soft and without losing support force.

💝SUPER COMFORTABLE GEL CUSHION & KEEP COOL - Our chair cushion is made from premium gel. It is soft yet firm. It helps improve posture and provides support while sitting for extended periods.The unique honeycomb cooling structure greatly reduce heat transfer between the buttocks and the seat and keep cool at the bottom for sedentary.

💝SUPPORTS TAILBONE & RELIEVES PRESSURE - Ergonomically designed seat cushion provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx / tailbone and promotes healthy posture, allowing you to power through your day.

💝REMOVABLE & WASHABLE NON-SLIP COVER - The gel cushion includes a textured bottom cover to ensure minimal to no movement in most seat. The cloth cover also has a zipper design, can be taken out for washing.

💝WIDELY APPLICATION - This multifunction desk seat cushion suitable for various use scenarios: Office Chair, Car Seat, Computer Chair, Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Patio, Recliner, Truck, Airplane Travel.

💝AMAZING PRACTICAL GIFT - This gel chair cushion can be used as a practical gift for family, friends and colleagues. Excellent comfort, effective support for the tailbone, to relieve the pressure on the hip caused by sedentary.
body.description: Specification: Item Mame: Gel Seat Cushion Material: Gel Color: Black Size: 42*37*4cm/16.5x14.5x1.6inch Weight: about 1050g/2.3LB Package Include: 1* Seat Cushion; 1* Cover Features: 1. Restains Its Shape - Gel seat cushion won't lose its support even after long term use 2. Fits Most Chairs - Support in your computer chair, office chair, deep seat, car seat, or recliner 3. With Cover - Included a soft, machine-washable cover

reviews.reviewText: I bought it to help my girlfriend sit higher. She loves it but says she isn't much higher but that it's very comfortable and told me to keep it for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This Is NOT Soft!
reviews.reviewText: I am disabled. My doctor told me I needed a special "pillow" to sit on so my bed sore could heal and to prevent new ones from forming. I bought 2 styles, this one and an egg crate style with a back on it to go with the seat. I'm returning these very HARD seats and buying 3 more of the egg crate so I have 1 for the car and 1 for my electric cart and my wife liked the soft one so much she asked for one too!If you're looking for a firm seat, this one is for you. If you're bed ridden or can't stand very often and/or you've got a sore or two on the southern exposure, I would reconsider and go with the egg crate style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A cush for my tush
reviews.reviewText: This is wonderful. My husband and I both have no padding on our butts. And usually no matter how much "normal" padding is on chairs, we still start to feel our butt bone digging into the hard surface. This cushion totally zero'd that out. Comfortable and cushy. Thanks!
It rolls up, doesn't stay in place.It's not comfortable at all either.
Very comfortable. Great for long drives
